ability.Tough Claws: This Pokemon's contact moves have their power multiplied by 1.3.
ability.Rock Head: This Pokemon does not take recoil damage.

Head Smash.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target.

Brave Bird.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Dragon Dance.effect: Raises the user's Attack and Speed by 1 stage.
